card.name: Rumble Gate
card.text: ■ Each of your creatures in the battle zone gets +1000 power until the End Step ■ Each of your creatures in the battle zone that can attack creatures can attack untapped creatures this turn.

card.name: Fists of Forever
card.text: ■ Choose one of your creatures in the battle zone. Whenever that creature wins a battle this turn, untap it.

card.name: Perionbris Dragoon
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ Whenever this creature attacks, all your other creatures must attack if able. ■ If this creature is tapped during your opponent's turn, each of your opponent's creatures must attacks if able.

card.name: Igars Dragoon
card.text: ■ Power Attacker ■ Double Breaker ■ If this creature is tapped during your opponent's turn, each of your opponent's creatures must attack if able.

card.name: Honoo, the Brave Blow
card.text: ■ Power Attacker ■ Whenever this creature attacks, this turn, each of your other creatures must attack if able.

card.name: Shot Wheel of Meizrazen
card.text: ■ Each of your Tyranno Drakes in the battle zone gets "power attacker +3000". ''(While attacking, a creature that has "power attacker +3000" gets +3000 power.)''

card.name: Suza of Gale
card.text: ■ Each of your Tyranno Drakes in the battle zone gets "speed attacker". ''(A creature that has "speed attacker" doesn't get summoning sickness.)''

card.name: Roubanrei of Impact
card.text: ■ Speed Attacker ■ This creature attacks each turn if able. ■ Whenever one of your Tyranno Drake or Brave Spirits attack, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has "blocker".

card.name: Smashblow Dragoon
card.text: ■ While battling a creature that has "blocker", this creature gets +4000 power.
